review: Having owned several streaming media boxes now, the FireTV is our favorite, the remote doesn't require line of sight which can be important if your TV is wall mounted and you want to tuck the device and HDMI cable away.  The interface is responsive and fluid and the selection and quality of games is good.  Of course the device really shines for Prime members with the Amazon Music, video, and photos/cloud drive integration (think photo slideshow screensaver).  The only disappointment for us is the voice search (which does hear and recognize well) on the remote does not search all channels, just the Amazon services.  As owners of a Roku and AppleTV this device is the go to for 90% of our streaming needs.
